programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Toadie is desperate to get in touch with Sonya, but Mark holds him responsible for her stress and the marriage seems in tatters. Jack begs Paige to reconsider leaving Erinsborough.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Sun-kissed Australian soap charting the latest comings and goings of the Summer Bay regulars.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Lost at Sea: Air France 447
programme.desc: In June 2009, a state-of-the-art Air France Airbus A330 passenger jet flying from Rio de Janeiro to Paris vanished over the Atlantic Ocean. Based on official reports and eyewitness accounts, and with the aid of dramatic reconstructions and cutting-edge CGI, this documentary charts the attempts to find the plane, recover the flight recorders and discover the cause of the crash, which killed all 228 people on board.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Gordon Morris leads a raid on the house of a suspected drug user, but the door won't budge. Meanwhile, Rich Woodward is in pursuit of a souped-up hot hatch, a late-night reveller kicks off in Nantwich town centre, and police dog Bonnie is used in the hunt for two runaways.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Tube: Going Underground
programme.sub-title: The World's First Deep Tube Line.
programme.desc: New series. Engineer and urban explorer Rob Bell examines the hidden story of how the world's oldest underground railway was built. He begins by exploring the construction of what is known today as the Northern Line, which runs 36 miles through London and connects the boroughs north and south of the Thames.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.sub-title: All New Traffic Cops: Under Attack.
programme.desc: A high-speed chase in Bradford's crowded streets ends very suddenly and the driver claims he just wants to get home to eat his takeaway while it is still hot. But is that the whole story? In Harrogate, a volatile drink-driver's rapid mood swings prove a test for the cops, while a large stash of cannabis is found at the scene of a major collision, which has left one person with life-threatening injuries. A couple suspected of dealing drugs are chased down and taken to the station, where they provide the traffic team with contrasting reactions to being held in custody. Jamie Theakston presents.(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: An evil warlord kills a barbarian chieftain, whose son grows up to be a mighty warrior and seeks revenge for his father's death. He finds there is more at stake, as the tyrant is close to acquiring all the pieces of a magic mask, which will make him all-powerful. Fantasy adventure, with Jason Momoa, Stephen Lang, Ron Perlman and Rose McGowan.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The New York police drama returns for its tenth and final series. A woman is found shot dead two days after attending a party thrown by fashion designer Nyle Brite. A search of her home uncovers a large selection of wigs, condoms and clothes by the designer, plus a number of nasty text messages on her phone, leading the team to wonder whether she moonlighted as a high-class prostitute. Crime drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: Engineer Rob Bells offers an insight into the history, design and building process of the Britannia Bridge. The difficult task of building the 100ft iron structure was taken up by civil engineer Robert Stephenson and his team, including William Fairbairn and Eaton Hodgkinson. But in May 1970, four youths set light to the famous bridge, and Rob meets a fireman who fought the blaze that fateful night.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice offers advice to a couple in Beckenham, Kent, whose 1930s-style house has been on the market for more than 14 months. She wastes no time in getting down to business, renting modern furniture, stripping the hall of clutter, exposing original features and neutralising the wallpaper.(n)

programme.title: HouseBusters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis and her team of new-age practitioners suggest ways in which changes to homes could positively affect the lives of their owners.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Pip Ahoy
programme.desc: Pip sets out to show he has the ship-building skills of his ancestors, and builds a sand yacht to race along the beach.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Hatsie feels unwell, so Nonna volunteers to take over her deliveries. However, Nonna has never driven a train before and things fail to go according to plan.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The heroine spots a tadpole in her glass of water. Animation, narrated by Julian Clary.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A baby elephant escapes when the circus comes to town, and the Paw Patrol sets out to find the animal.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his team are asked to create a temporary city beach in Spring City, but it proves harder than expected to keep the beach tidy.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Pontypandy Fire Station is opened to the public and Norman is eager to try things out, crawling under safety tape and getting into the driving seat of a fire engine. However, his inquisitive nature and desire for excitement lead to danger when he climbs onto the roof to get closer to Tom and his helicopter.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Paxton overhears Toby say that Thomas has `lost his puff' after he accidentally gets his firebox wet.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive puppet climbs aboard a special bus, and sets off on a tour to learn more about the world.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: The girls meet a Lightning Genie and help him catch his bolt.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Amazing Eyebrows.
programme.desc: Fuse wants to wear his new eyebrows when he collects his trophy at the Toyland awards, but they have gone missing, and Noddy is accused of theft.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the team must rescue a girl and her cat when they become stuck on the ski lift while enjoying a day trip on Jake's Mountain.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Gaston catches a cold, so Holly invites him to stay at the castle.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Grizel finds a way to disguise herself as Digby, and enjoys tormenting his friends. They cannot understand why he is behaving so badly.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa pays a visit to Aunty and Uncle Pig, and discovers Cousin Chloe has a new puppet theatre.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The youngster tries to get Daddy Pig fit and healthy.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Peggy feels left out because all the baby penguins except her have had their own special day, so Wissper organises a party.(n)

programme.title: Toot the Tiny Tugboat
programme.desc: Bethan wants to start a collection, and Toot offers to help - but she cannot decide what she wants to collect.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Shazia Javed becomes concerned when she meets Mohammed, a young boy with an unusually high temperature and no identifiable cause and decides to send him to the hospital. Meanwhile, the team are shocked when they discover a patient has driven himself to the surgery after showing symptoms of a stroke, and Dr Nithy Nanda takes action when he meets Christopher and discovers complications following a recent operation.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: Life on the Dole.
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on four single parents struggling to provide for their children while living on state welfare. Lauren dreams of a career in the Army, where she would get help with childcare, and 40-year-old Joanne is struggling to heat the home she shares with her eight-year-old daughter. Craig has only recently taken sole responsibility for his daughter after the end of his relationship, while clairvoyant and mother-of-six Sue is planing a council house swap - but competition is fierce.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Sun-kissed Australian soap charting the latest comings and goings of the Summer Bay regulars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates when two pharmaceutical executives are murdered, uncovering a criminal who changes his identity for each offence he commits, and has evaded capture across several countries. To make matters worse, the agents are made to feel the pressure by the watchful eye of Granger. Crime drama, starring Chris O'Donnell and Miguel Ferrer.(n)

programme.title: Strangers in Amish Country
programme.desc: Premiere. A military nurse returns from a tour of duty in Afghanistan to her family's farm in rural Ohio, and falls for an Amish neighbour after an intruder wreaks havoc. Romantic drama, starring Jes Macallan, Sean Faris and Kelly McGillis.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Sun-kissed Australian soap charting the latest comings and goings of the Summer Bay regulars.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Gordon Morris leads a raid on the house of a suspected drug user, but the door won't budge. Meanwhile, Rich Woodward is in pursuit of a souped-up hot hatch, a late-night reveller kicks off in Nantwich town centre, and police dog Bonnie is used in the hunt for two runaways.(n)

programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: Documentary examining one of London's most recognised landmarks, St Paul's Cathedral. This film covers its creation by Christopher Wren after the great fire of London in 1666, Hitler's attempt to weaken British morale during the Second World War by destroying the building, and its first royal wedding between Prince Charles and Lady Diana Spencer in 1981.(n)

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire: A Year in the Wild: Autumn.
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a dangerous and testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.(n)

programme.title: Restless Legs Syndrome: Desperate for Help
programme.desc: Documentary about people with a compulsion to constantly move their feet. It's a condition so severe for some that they want to have their legs chopped off. Cameras follow the pensioner who contemplates suicide due to severe sleep deprivation caused by his tingling legs, and the sufferer who is housebound due to the embarrassment of her wriggling legs.(n)

programme.title: The Boy Who Sees Upside Down
programme.desc: The story of 12-year-old Mahendra Ahirwar from central India, who lives with a rare muscle-wasting condition not only means he can not stand or walk, but also leaves his neck muscles so weak, he cannot lift his head up at all. His family have been unable to pay for any treatment - but when his story was reported in the UK Press, Liverpool woman Julie Jones was so moved by Mahendra's plight that she set up an online fundraising page. Cameras follow his pioneering surgery.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul WS Anderson tunes-up Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" in this action flick about a contest pitting a convict against other convicts, with the winner walking off with his freedom(n)

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. A group of people find shelter in a relay station and are surrounded by a horde of raging trucks. After a tremendous fight. Bill, Bubba, Brett and some others manage to reach the coast and set sail to an island void of technology(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: After a disastrous summer, Harry returns to begin his fifth year at Hogwarts, one of the toughest he will ever have. A few group of students and parents believe him or Dumbledore that Voldemort is really back, and a never-ending series of articles states that they are insane. On top of that, Dolores Umbridge, the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, proves to be the nastiest person Harry has ever encountered(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Imported by the Army for an early a.m. radio show, Cronauer blasts the formerly staid, sanitized airwaves with a constant barrage of rapid-fire humor and the hottest hits from back home. The G.I.s love him but the brass is up in arms!(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: The creation of one of the most memorable books of the 1960s -- and the impact the writing and research would have on its author -- is explored in this drama based on a true story. In 1959, Truman Capote (played by Philip Seymour Hoffman) was a critically acclaimed novelist who had earned a small degree of celebrity for his work when he read a short newspaper item about a multiple murder in a small Kansas town. For some reason, the story fascinated Capote, and he asked William Shawn (Bob Balaban), his editor at The New Yorker, to let him write a piece about the case. Capote had long believed that in the right hands, a true story could be molded into a tale as compelling as any fiction, and he believed this event, in which the brutal and unimaginable was visited upon a community where it was least expected, could be just the right material. Capote traveled to Kansas with his close friend Harper Lee (Catherine Keener), herself becoming a major literary figure with the success of To Kill a Mockingbird, and while Capote's effete and mannered personal style stuck out like a sore thumb in Kansas, in time he gained the trust of Alvin Dewey (Chris Cooper), the Kansas Bureau of Investigation agent investigating the murder of the Clutter family, and with his help Capote's magazine piece grew into a full-length book. Capote also became familiar with the petty criminals who killed the Clutter family, Dick Hickock (Mark Pellegrino) and Perry Smith (Clifton Collins Jr.), and in Smith he found a troubling kindred spirit more like himself than he wanted to admit. After attaining a sort of friendship with Smith under the assumption that the man would be executed before the book was ever published, Capote finds himself forced to directly confront the moral implications of his actions with regards to both his role in the man's death, and the way that he would be remembered. Capote also co-stars Bruce Greenwood as Capote's longtime companion Jack Dunphy, and Amy Ryan as Mary Dewey, Alvin's wife who became a confidante of Capote's(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: A Swedish man opts for a sex change and undergoes the world's first gender reassignment surgery, but his marriage suffers as his artist wife struggles with the transition(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care(n)

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Arnie's at his best as tough L.A. detective John Kimble who must find a drug lord's wife so she can testify in court. Problem is, she's gone into hiding to protect her son. With only the name of the kid's elementary school, Kimble must go undercover... As a kindergarten teacher! Academy Award winner Linda Hunt joins the cast with Academy Award nominee Cathy Moriarty in this great blend of action, thrills, and humor(n)

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: CIA agent Alex Scott is teamed with an unlikely partner for a secret mission in Budapest to recover a superplane: loud-mouthed boxing champ Kelly Robinson. Spy comedy(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Ice cool Jason Statham transports anything, no questions asked. However, one package could be his undoing in this crime thriller from writer Luc Besson. Contains violence(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Ted (voice of Seth MacFarlane) ties the knot with Tami-Lynn (Jessica Barth), and recruits his best friend John (Mark Wahlberg) as a sperm donor in order to start a family in this sequel to the comedy hit about a teddy bear come to life. Later, when the Commonwealth of Massachusetts demands that Ted appear before a judge to prove he's a real person, the frisky bear and his pal vow to fight for their civil rights. Morgan Freeman and Amanda Seyfried co-star(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: David Fincher's follow-up to Fight Club is a claustrophobic thriller starring Jodie Foster and Kirsten Stewart as a mother and daughter trapped in their new house's safe room by a gang of thieves. The housebreakers are a dynamic trio desperate to get their hands on millions of dollars' worth of bonds the previous owner left behind, and their arrival prompts divorcee Meg and 11-year-old Sarah to take refuge in the vault-like room of the title. Unfortunately for them, that's where the loot is concealed, and Fincher ramps up the tension with some exhilarating camera work as a deadly stand-off ensues(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Grand Visions is a short season of films driven by the vision and boldness of strong directors; passion projects made on a grand and uncompromising scale. The season kicks off with director Baz Luhrmann's western/ war adventure/ romance hybrid that's set in the Australian outback and stars Nicole Kidman and Hugh Jackman. It is 1939 and Lady Sarah Ashley has travelled halfway round the world to persuade her husband to sell his cattle station and return back home to Blighty. It's soon obvious that she hasn't anticipated the primitive realities of life in northern Australia, nor has her upbringing prepared her for an encounter with the likes of the rough and ready drover who is instructed to chaperone her from Darwin to the ranch. But the pair are fated to become much more closely acquainted than either could have imagined. The plot also encompasses the lot of the region's Aboriginal people, via the plight of local lad Nullah, and the first Japanese attacks on the northern territories. Edited for language(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: James Cox directs the sleazy Hollywood murder tale Wonderland, starring Val Kilmer as legendary porn star John Holmes. Using a non-linear plot structure, the film explores different perspectives of the quadruple homicide that occurred on July 1, 1981, in the Hollywood Hills. At the lowest point of his career and the height of his drug addiction, Holmes was implicated in the murders of the Wonderland gang: Ron Launius (Josh Lucas), Billy Deverell (Tim Blake Nelson), Barbara Richardson (Natasha Gregson Wagner), and Joy Miller (Janeane Garofalo). Launius' wife, Susan (Christina Applegate), was the only survivor. Led by Detective Sam Nico (Ted Levine), the police investigation reveals a dark criminal underworld surrounding Holmes, his disapproving wife, Sharon (Lisa Kudrow), and his innocent teenage girlfriend, Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth). Eric Bogosian stars as notorious Hollywood nightclub owner Eddie Nash. Wonderland premiered at the 2003 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Gritty drama. Mick O'Brien, a teenager from Chicago, must face the ultimate consequence when he is linked to the death of a rival gang member's younger brother(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A stolen painting and a crooked land deal intertwines the destinies of a Russian mobster, a London gangster and a junkie punk rocker in writer-director Guy Ritchie's stylish and clever caper film starring Gerard Butler ("300") and Tom Wilkinson ("John Adams")(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex . Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production(n)

programme.title: Friday Night Lights
programme.desc: From one of the best sports books ever written comes a compelling, fact-based chronicle of a high-school football team in West Texas. There, winning isn't everything, it's the only thing. Billy Bob Thornton stars as the coach, and country-music star Tim McGraw plays the abusive father of a player. The film was directed and co-written by Peter Berg, who adapted his cousin H.G. Bissinger's bestseller(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Drama about an unconventional new English teacher and his ultimately questionable impact on an elite Vermont boys' academy. Robin Williams, in a straight role, blows into the stuffy halls of academe like a breath of fresh air, startling colleagues and delighting boys with his disdain for traditional teaching methods and text books. But the seeds of rebellion he sows have far-reaching effects that he never intended(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while in the act of divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once more send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but the shock of coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: In an effort to recapture their youth, three disillusioned men start a frat house, then run afoul of the dean. Luke Wilson and Will Ferrell star in this uneven "Animal House" rip-off from director Todd Phillips, who co-wrote the script(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: Classic sidesplittingly funny comedy stars John Belushi as the head of the delinquent Delta House fraternity that the dean of Faber College plans to rid his campus of(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fourth installment of the "Jurassic Park" franchise, two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In the next installment of the "Maze Runner" franchise Thomas (Dylan O'Brien), Teresa (Kaya Scodelario) and the rest of the Gladers search for clues about WCKD, a powerful organization in the Scorch, a bleak landscape that is filled with dangerous obstacles. The Gladers partner with resistance fighters to take on WCKD in an attempt to discover their plans for the future in this young-adult dystopian thriller from 20th Century Fox. Directed by Wes Ball who previously directed the original film, The Maze Runner. Cast includes Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Giancarlo Esposito, Aidan Gillen, Ki Hong Lee, Barry Pepper, Lili Taylor and Patricia Clarkson(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul WS Anderson tunes-up Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" in this action flick about a contest pitting a convict against other convicts, with the winner walking off with his freedom(n)

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. A group of people find shelter in a relay station and are surrounded by a horde of raging trucks. After a tremendous fight. Bill, Bubba, Brett and some others manage to reach the coast and set sail to an island void of technology(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: James Cox directs the sleazy Hollywood murder tale Wonderland, starring Val Kilmer as legendary porn star John Holmes. Using a non-linear plot structure, the film explores different perspectives of the quadruple homicide that occurred on July 1, 1981, in the Hollywood Hills. At the lowest point of his career and the height of his drug addiction, Holmes was implicated in the murders of the Wonderland gang: Ron Launius (Josh Lucas), Billy Deverell (Tim Blake Nelson), Barbara Richardson (Natasha Gregson Wagner), and Joy Miller (Janeane Garofalo). Launius' wife, Susan (Christina Applegate), was the only survivor. Led by Detective Sam Nico (Ted Levine), the police investigation reveals a dark criminal underworld surrounding Holmes, his disapproving wife, Sharon (Lisa Kudrow), and his innocent teenage girlfriend, Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth). Eric Bogosian stars as notorious Hollywood nightclub owner Eddie Nash. Wonderland premiered at the 2003 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Gritty drama. Mick O'Brien, a teenager from Chicago, must face the ultimate consequence when he is linked to the death of a rival gang member's younger brother(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A stolen painting and a crooked land deal intertwines the destinies of a Russian mobster, a London gangster and a junkie punk rocker in writer-director Guy Ritchie's stylish and clever caper film starring Gerard Butler ("300") and Tom Wilkinson ("John Adams")(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: The third entry in the popular pulp-adventure series finds Rick O'Connell and wife, Evelyn, in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex . Together they battle a centuries-old Chinese emperor and his undead army(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production(n)

programme.title: Friday Night Lights
programme.desc: From one of the best sports books ever written comes a compelling, fact-based chronicle of a high-school football team in West Texas. There, winning isn't everything, it's the only thing. Billy Bob Thornton stars as the coach, and country-music star Tim McGraw plays the abusive father of a player. The film was directed and co-written by Peter Berg, who adapted his cousin H.G. Bissinger's bestseller(n)

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Drama about an unconventional new English teacher and his ultimately questionable impact on an elite Vermont boys' academy. Robin Williams, in a straight role, blows into the stuffy halls of academe like a breath of fresh air, startling colleagues and delighting boys with his disdain for traditional teaching methods and text books. But the seeds of rebellion he sows have far-reaching effects that he never intended(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while in the act of divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once more send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but the shock of coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: In an effort to recapture their youth, three disillusioned men start a frat house, then run afoul of the dean. Luke Wilson and Will Ferrell star in this uneven "Animal House" rip-off from director Todd Phillips, who co-wrote the script(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: Classic sidesplittingly funny comedy stars John Belushi as the head of the delinquent Delta House fraternity that the dean of Faber College plans to rid his campus of(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: Evil Up Close
programme.sub-title: The Playing Card Killer: Alfredo Galan
programme.desc: The Playing Card Killer: Alfredo Galan. Desde la escuela, Alfredo Galán siempre quiso ser el centro de atención, al no lograrlo se une al ejército. Estando en las fuerzas de paz españolas en la cuidad de Mostar, estaba bajo órdenes estrictas de no responder a provocaciones. El aspirante a héroe se sintió inútil, le dijo a un amigo en privado que él quería saber cómo se sentía matar. De regreso a España, fue enviado para ayudar a la limpieza de un derrame petrolero y sintió que era una tarea que no estaba a su altura. Cuando una simple discusión con un trabajador civil se tornó violento, tuvo que abandonar el ejército por motivos médicos. Luego pasó semanas esperando decidir a quien matar...al azar. Su primera víctima fue un portero, el segundo un hombre que esperaba el autobús. Galán se convertiría en uno de los peores asesinos en serie de España con seis víctimas y dejando como identificador curioso, un naipe en los cuerpos de cada víctima(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and Richard Hammond take charge of shooting a car chase for a film version of The Sweeney, assisting with the stunt-driving choreography and the direction of lead actors Ray Winstone and Ben Drew. James May takes the Vauxhall Corsa VXR Nurburgring for a run around the test track, and delivers his verdict on the updated Fiat Panda. Hollywood actor Ryan Reynolds is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are in Russia as the motoring magazine returns, taking part in a race across the urban landscape of St Petersburg. James defends the honour of the car in a very small Renault, Richard tries to prove that pedalling is faster by riding a bicycle, while Jeremy attempts to demonstrate that water is the quickest way across town by piloting a hovercraft. To make matters more complicated, all three presenters are racing not only one another but also the Stig, who is making his way toward the finish line by public transport. Plus, the new Lamborghini Huracan is put through its paces and singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran takes to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a project to build a car that can turn into a hovercraft and bring relief to flooded areas. Their efforts do not start smoothly, but it is not long before the trio are demonstrating the brilliance of their creation with an eventful journey down the River Avon. Plus, Jeremy grabs the keys to two variants of the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG supercar - the V8-engined Black Series with a roaring 622bhp, and the 740bhp Electric Drive, which is powered by four electric motors. X-Men and Les Miserables star Hugh Jackman is the latest celebrity to take the new Reasonably Priced Car around the test track.(n)

programme.title: Sin City Motors
programme.desc: Steve Darnell and the team build a train-themed rat rod. Railroads are a big part of US history, but it remains to be seen whether they can they keep the project on track.(n)

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The wrestler challenges eight contestants to triumph over a series of gruelling physical endurance tests.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson tests the new BMW M4 at the track, before switching to the German manufacturer's hybrid-powered i8 for a trip up the A1 to Whitby, North Yorkshire, where he decides which of the two he would rather take for the drive home. With Land Rover production ceasing in the UK later this year, Richard Hammond pays tribute to the 4x4 by attempting to drive one straight up the side of a dam, while James May puts the Mercedes AMG GT through its paces. Taking to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car are Will Smith and Margot Robbie.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May put three supercars through their paces in Italy. Their weapons of choice are the 691bhp Lamborghini Aventador, McLaren's hi-tech MP4-12C, and a British brute in the form of the Noble M600. The journey begins at Nardo, a high-speed testing ground so vast it can be seen from space, and includes a nerve-racking drive in Rome before reaching its conclusion with a timed challenge against the Stig at the Imola circuit. The trio are also joined by The Voice mentor Will.i am, who takes the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.sub-title: Scrappers - Back in the Yard: Many Happy Returns.
programme.desc: The documentary about straight-talking scrap yard owner Terry Walker and glamorous wife Lyndsay returns. Having had a difficult year due to financial difficulties and a serious accident, they hope her 50th birthday will be a new beginning. Now it is their last chance to get the yard running right so they can hand it on to the kids. Terry is trying to drum health and safety into the lads and has decided to lose a day's takings and put them in a training session on cutting tools.(n)

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.sub-title: Scrappers - Back in the Yard: You Can't Get the Staff.
programme.desc: Lyndsay is mad at Terry and with good reason too, as he has sacked their son.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the mid-engined Alfa Romeo 4C on the shores of Lake Como in Italy - but his enjoyment of the lightweight vehicle is disturbed by the arrival of Jeremy Clarkson, who demands a race against his quad bike. Jeremy also visits Belgium, putting the McLaren P1 hypercar to the test in Bruges and around the Spa-Francorchamps Formula One circuit - and its combined power output of more than 900bhp generated from electricity and turbocharged petrol V8 power is likely to cause astonishment. Meanwhile, James May spends time at Camp Bastion in Afghanistan to learn about the army's vehicle redeployment efforts, and Thor star Tom Hiddleston tries to coax the best time he can muster from the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: James May's Cars of the People
programme.desc: The former Top Gear presenter examines the social significance of cars in the 20th century. He begins by travelling to Germany, Italy and Russia to examine how dictators kick-started the mobilization of the masses, finding tales of design brilliance, abject failure, war, fraud and double dealing. James also learns about how the British motor industry blew a gift-wrapped chance to rule the world and he gets his own back with a stunt that means bad news for one of the planet's most hated cars.(n)

programme.title: Dave Gorman: Modern Life Is Goodish
programme.desc: The comedian performs another round of witty stand-up shows, beginning as he gets involved in shredding some naughty magazines, helps a gerbil to fulfil its destiny, and is surprised by the pictures that develop from an old-fashioned camera he finds.(n)

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: Rob Beckett, Miles Jupp, Romesh Ranganathan and Tiff Stevenson join regular panellists Hugh Dennis and Andy Parsons to give their irreverent takes on the biggest stories to hit the headlines, through stand-up spots and improvised games. Chaired by Dara O Briain.(n)

programme.title: Mock the Week
programme.desc: The topical comedy show returns after an eight-week break, with Dara O'Briain, Hugh Dennis and Andy Parsons joined by Josh Widdicombe, Katherine Ryan, Milton Jones and Ed Gamble to give their irreverent takes on the biggest stories to hit the headlines, through stand-up spots and improvised games.(n)

programme.title: QI

programme.title: James May's Cars of the People
programme.desc: The former Top Gear presenter examines the social significance of cars in the 20th century. He begins by travelling to Germany, Italy and Russia to examine how dictators kick-started the mobilization of the masses, finding tales of design brilliance, abject failure, war, fraud and double dealing. James also learns about how the British motor industry blew a gift-wrapped chance to rule the world and he gets his own back with a stunt that means bad news for one of the planet's most hated cars.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson tests the new BMW M4 at the track, before switching to the German manufacturer's hybrid-powered i8 for a trip up the A1 to Whitby, North Yorkshire, where he decides which of the two he would rather take for the drive home. With Land Rover production ceasing in the UK later this year, Richard Hammond pays tribute to the 4x4 by attempting to drive one straight up the side of a dam, while James May puts the Mercedes AMG GT through its paces. Taking to the test track in the Reasonably Priced Car are Will Smith and Margot Robbie.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May put three supercars through their paces in Italy. Their weapons of choice are the 691bhp Lamborghini Aventador, McLaren's hi-tech MP4-12C, and a British brute in the form of the Noble M600. The journey begins at Nardo, a high-speed testing ground so vast it can be seen from space, and includes a nerve-racking drive in Rome before reaching its conclusion with a timed challenge against the Stig at the Imola circuit. The trio are also joined by The Voice mentor Will.i am, who takes the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Richard Hammond gets behind the wheel of the mid-engined Alfa Romeo 4C on the shores of Lake Como in Italy - but his enjoyment of the lightweight vehicle is disturbed by the arrival of Jeremy Clarkson, who demands a race against his quad bike. Jeremy also visits Belgium, putting the McLaren P1 hypercar to the test in Bruges and around the Spa-Francorchamps Formula One circuit - and its combined power output of more than 900bhp generated from electricity and turbocharged petrol V8 power is likely to cause astonishment. Meanwhile, James May spends time at Camp Bastion in Afghanistan to learn about the army's vehicle redeployment efforts, and Thor star Tom Hiddleston tries to coax the best time he can muster from the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Sin City Motors

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson heads to Italy to get behind the wheel of the exclusive, hand-crafted Alfa Romeo Disco Volante, which is made by coachbuilder Touring Superleggera and based on the manufacturer's already rare 8C Competizione sports car. Richard Hammond asserts authority over the sand dunes of Abu Dhabi in the six-wheel-drive Mercedes-Benz G63 AMG 6x6, while James May defies his status as Captain Slow by blasting two Caterhams around the test track - the minimalist entry-level Seven 160 and the full-fat supercharged Seven 620R. Comedian Jack Whitehall sets a lap time in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The presenters try to make an ordinary second-hand car lap the test track as fast as a new, purpose-built sports saloon. programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The three motoring enthusiasts head to Spain on a mission to help its struggling economy - but the convertible supercars they take are very expensive and anything but discreet. With Jeremy Clarkson in a McLaren MP4-12C, Richard Hammond driving a Ferrari 458 and James May behind the wheel of an Audi R8 V10, the trio encounter mountain passes, empty towns and an abandoned airport before creating their own street circuit in a deserted Madrid development. Plus, Sherlock star Benedict Cumberbatch sets a lap time in the Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.desc: Back in 1983, 16-year-old Amy Taskerland was murdered on the night of the school disco. More than 30 years later, the unearthing of a time capsule and the discovery of her voice on a mix tape inside prompts Miller and co to delve back into the case, starting by interviewing Amy's best friend Harriet and her former teacher Mr Hines. The recording features a strange mix of music and poetry, including words from a speech written in secret for the Queen for broadcast in the event of a nuclear war. But how did Amy get a copy of it, and was its secret nature the reason she was killed? Elsewhere, Miller enjoys her first romance since her divorce, while Gerry goes on his future son-in-law's stag night. programme.desc: Penny hosts a Halloween costume party, which proves a worthy test for the boys' social skills. During the event, Leonard has a run-in with Penny's ex-boyfriend. Kaley Cuoco, Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny is forced to take Howard's place in the boys' video-game night while he is otherwise engaged with one of her promiscuous friends. Simon Helberg, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki star.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted tries to fire his former boss Hammond, who is now working for him - but every time he gets the opportunity, he finds a new reason not to. Meanwhile, Barney discovers Lily once painted a nude portrait of Marshall, and asks her to do one of him as well. Guest starring Bryan Cranston (Breaking Bad, Malcolm in the Middle).(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: The friends miss the Super Bowl to attend a barman's funeral, and make a pact not to find out the score until the next day. However, adhering to the agreement proves difficult with people all around them discussing the game. Starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake makes an arrest without much proof, and so has to spend the next 48 hours collecting enough evidence to keep his suspect in custody. While his co-workers are forced to help him out over the weekend, Charles judges a pie contest between Rosa and Gina, and the Captain gives advice to Terry, who has a problem involving his brother-in-law. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake's dreams come true when he gets the chance to spend the day with his hero, veteran crime reporter Jimmy Brogan, but their encounter has unexpected consequences. Meanwhile, Terry and Charles prepare Rosa for a day in court, teaching her to be less terrifying on the witness stand. Guest starring Stacy Keach.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry and Erica persuade Adam not to go trick-or-treating for Halloween, but to take his girlfriend Dana to a haunted house instead. Dustin Ybarra guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry badgers Murray into getting him a puppy, but he is upset when the dog takes more of a liking to his father than to him. Beverly wants to join in with Erica and Lainey's pyjama party, but when the girls exclude her from the gathering she soon finds a way to eavesdrop on them.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny finds out Leonard's family never celebrated his birthdays, so she enlists Sheldon's help to organise a surprise party, while Howard gets him out of the way by staging an emergency hospital visit. Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Following the break-up of Penny's relationship, Leonard finally summons up the courage to ask her out. When she accepts, they both turn to Sheldon for advice on how to handle the forthcoming date. Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Drama following the lives and loves of a group of teenagers and young adults in Chester.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre and Bow try to accept that Jack may have a blue-collar future when he and Diane bring home the results of their career tests. Comedy, starring Anthony Anderson.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Barry's membership of a friendship group is jeopardised and a family swear jar is introduced. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lainey tries to set her father up with a `woman of interest' by using new video dating technology. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard returns from his research expedition in the North Sea and undergoes an adjustment period with Sheldon. Howard experiences an unusual emotional reaction as a result of his relationship with his mother. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends compete in a scavenger hunt designed by Raj to test their scientific knowledge and life skills, but the game brings out the best and worst in everyone. programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Ocean Giants
programme.desc: Stephen Fry narrates this documentary exploring the vocal ranges of marine mammals. Sperm whales produce clicks to locate giant squid two miles beneath the ocean surface, and narwhals use a similar technique to find breathing holes in Arctic ice floes. Bottlenose dolphins communicate with fishermen in Brazil, humpbacks offer haunting operatic performances and boto dolphins create bat-like ultrasonic calls to help find fish in the murky Amazon River.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Amazing secrets of how rain is made - some raindrops form around micrometeorites from space, while others are created by bacteria floating into the upper atmosphere.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The science of what happens when a tsunami emerges from open ocean and bears down on land, and forecasting where on earth the next mega-tsunamis are likely to strike.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart explains how geology, geography and climate have influenced humanity, discovering how four different planetary forces have shaped the history of the species. He begins by highlighting how active fault lines in the Earth's surface provided the key resources used by ancient civilisations to survive.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: The story of the invertebrates that left the sea to move on to land 400 million years ago. Since then, they have become the most successful group of animals, without which the land's ecosystem would collapse. David Attenborough examines the insects' behaviour, travelling to South Africa and Venezuela to witness the habits and routines of millipedes and centipedes.(n)

programme.title: Operation Wild
programme.desc: Broadcaster Clare Balding and vet Steve Leonard travel the world to watch vets perform innovative life-saving operations on a variety of wild animals. This first edition features a baby panda called Zhu Xia in south-west China that needs an MRI scan, and rescued gorilla Shufai in Cameroon, who was shot by poachers when he was a baby. Plus, a manta ray on the Japanese island of Okinawa that needs an ultra-sound scan to determine if it's pregnant, and a four-ton elephant in Laos with a gunshot wound.(n)

programme.desc: The science of what happens when a tsunami emerges from open ocean and bears down on land, and forecasting where on earth the next mega-tsunamis are likely to strike.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart explains how geology, geography and climate have influenced humanity, discovering how four different planetary forces have shaped the history of the species. He begins by highlighting how active fault lines in the Earth's surface provided the key resources used by ancient civilisations to survive.(n)

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive
programme.desc: Life-and-death situations and how to survive them, beginning with tornado preparations and encounters with killer bees.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: The story of the invertebrates that left the sea to move on to land 400 million years ago. Since then, they have become the most successful group of animals, without which the land's ecosystem would collapse. David Attenborough examines the insects' behaviour, travelling to South Africa and Venezuela to witness the habits and routines of millipedes and centipedes.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: Amazing secrets of how rain is made - some raindrops form around micrometeorites from space, while others are created by bacteria floating into the upper atmosphere.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The science of what happens when a tsunami emerges from open ocean and bears down on land, and forecasting where on earth the next mega-tsunamis are likely to strike.(n)

programme.title: Operation Wild
programme.desc: Broadcaster Clare Balding and vet Steve Leonard travel the world to watch vets perform innovative life-saving operations on a variety of wild animals. This first edition features a baby panda called Zhu Xia in south-west China that needs an MRI scan, and rescued gorilla Shufai in Cameroon, who was shot by poachers when he was a baby. Plus, a manta ray on the Japanese island of Okinawa that needs an ultra-sound scan to determine if it's pregnant, and a four-ton elephant in Laos with a gunshot wound.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Iain Stewart explains how geology, geography and climate have influenced humanity, discovering how four different planetary forces have shaped the history of the species. He begins by highlighting how active fault lines in the Earth's surface provided the key resources used by ancient civilisations to survive.(n)

programme.title: Ocean Giants
programme.desc: Stephen Fry narrates this documentary exploring the vocal ranges of marine mammals. Sperm whales produce clicks to locate giant squid two miles beneath the ocean surface, and narwhals use a similar technique to find breathing holes in Arctic ice floes. Bottlenose dolphins communicate with fishermen in Brazil, humpbacks offer haunting operatic performances and boto dolphins create bat-like ultrasonic calls to help find fish in the murky Amazon River.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: The lives of creatures that are dangerous on land.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Documentary exploring aspects of animal anatomy, as Chris Packham uses groundbreaking science to look closely at predatory beings and what makes them successful.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The science behind places like Canada's Bay of Fundy, where water levels rise as much as 50ft during high tide, and the 10ft `bores waves' of Alaska's Turnagain Arm.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of the Earth
programme.desc: The effect of volcanoes on the weather, as eruptions create localised phenomena like acid rain and violent volcanic lightning.(n)

programme.title: How Earth Made Us
programme.desc: Professor Iain Stewart explores the influence of water, examining 6,000-year-old rock engravings that suggests the Sahara desert was once a much more hospitable place. He also traces the cycle of fresh water, discovering how an aberration in the pattern caused a severe drought in the Middle East during the last ice age. Finally, he demonstrates how the need for a reliable source of water has inspired some of the key advances in human civilisation.(n)

programme.title: Life in the Undergrowth
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the tale of winged insects, witnessing mayflies emerging from their larval cases in central Hungary and purple crow butterflies in the valleys of Taiwan. Slow-motion cameras reveal the incredible flight skills that enable the creatures to find new territories and sources of food. The aeronautical tricks employed by heavier insects such as bees and beetles are also revealed.(n)

programme.title: The Wonder of Animals
programme.desc: Documentary exploring aspects of animal anatomy, as Chris Packham uses groundbreaking science to look closely at predatory beings and what makes them successful.(n)

programme.title: So You Think You'd Survive
programme.desc: Harrowing caught-on-camera video footage reveals the perils of broken water mains, lightning, hot-air balloon crashes, rip currents and giant tsunamis.(n)

programme.title: Operation Wild
programme.desc: Clare Balding travels to South Africa to join a veterinary team trying to help a rhino called Thandi who was attacked by poachers for her horn. For the first time, a plastic surgeon will attempt a skin graft on the animal to heal the wound. She also visits the rainforest of Borneo to follow the story of an orangutan who needs cataracts removing from her eyes so that she can be released back into the wild. Elsewhere, vet Steve Leonard takes a trip to Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, where the latest technology is being used to help chimpanzees with heart disease. He also visits the South African city of Pretoria, where a Cape fur seal requires a CT scan to identify the root cause of her illness, and a giraffe urgently needs to be anaesthetised to treat a leg injury.(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Yankees scout Al Percolo is banished to Mexico when his star pitcher fails in front of the biggest crowd of the season. But kooky thrower Steve Nebraska could take him back to the major league. Baseball laughs from the director of The Bad News Bears(n)

programme.title: Ed
programme.desc: A struggling minor-league pitcher forms a friendship with his team's newest star--a baseball-playing chimpanzee(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge(n)

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Fantasy about bickering brothers who are propelled into outer space by playing a mysterious board game. Based on the children's book by Chris Van Allsburg(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: A baseball legend almost finished with his distinguished career at the age of thirty-seven has one last chance to prove who he is, what he is capable of and win the heart of the woman he has loved for the past four years. As he pitches that night, he must decide whether to accept the trade or quit the game he loves, and between innings, he recalls meeting Jane, their first date, happy times, miscommunication, and what may be a final break. Meanwhile, with Vin Scully announcing, one Yankee batter after another fails to reach first base. Can Billy pitch a perfect game, and if so, what does it matter if he loses Jane?(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Tired of being bullied at school and neglected at home, Jess Aarons and Leslie Burke escape into the woods, where Leslie opens Jess's mind to the amazing kingdom of Terabithia. It's a secret land where they reign supreme among the giants, ogres and other fantastical creatures they create(n)

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: When Libby Parsons goes sailing with her husband Nick, she's shocked to wake up covered in blood, with a gore-slicked knife beside her and no sign of her spouse. And when a Coastguard boat appears on the scene, things get even worse for her in director Bruce Beresford's revenge thriller. Libby is imprisoned for his murder on the circumstantial evidence - which also includes a massive death insurance payout - and her best friend, Angie, steps in to look after Libby's young son, Matty. But, speaking to Angie on the phone one day, Libby hears Matty say 'Hello Daddy... ' in the background and puts two and two together: she's been framed by her closest friends. Unfortunately for them, Libby discovers that once someone's been convicted of a crime, they can't be tried for it again. So she's got nothing to lose, and if she can get out of jail, she can make the pair pay the ultimate price for their treachery. Also starring Tommy Lee Jones(n)

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which an independent woman agrees to marry an older man - and then finds herself inexorably drawn to his misfit younger brother when her intended takes leave to visit his sick mother. A quirky blend of wit and romanticism that explores the tangled relationships and foibles that besiege a close-knit Italian-American family. Winner of three Oscars. Best Actress, Supporting Actress and Original Screenplay(n)

programme.title: Sorority Boys
programme.desc: If Mel Gibson had to get inside the mind of women to respect and understand them, in this teenage film the main characters will have to dress up as such to be able to do the same. Adam, Dave and Doofer are three college students who, after being thrown out of their brotherhood, find refuge in a neighboring sisterhood, made up of… feminists. To secure their space there they must dress up and keep a low profile. Until now, they had been cruel to girls, but this soon changes(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: In Love With the King. Historical drama about three women manoeuvring to become queen of England begins in 1463, as a secret wedding between a commoner and a royal leads to some regal intrigue(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: In the plot twisting high-tech thriller Face/Off relentless FBI agent Sean Archer must go dangerously undercover to investigate the location of a lethal biological weapon planted by his arch rival, the sadistic terrorist for hire Castor Troy. After undergoing a radical surgical procedure, Archer literally 'borrows' Troy's face and identity to carry out his mission. But things go awry when Troy emerging from a coma, transforms into Archer and wreaks havoc upon his life, both at work and at home. As the bomb continues to tick and the tension mounts, it becomes a high stakes game of cat and mouse as both Archer and Troy, ironically trapped in their enemy's body, try to save face...their own(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Two middle-aged slackers become members of the same family when one's mother marries the other's father, and sparks soon start to fly between the contentious new step-siblings(n)

programme.desc: In this unconventional yet heartwarming family drama, an aging rocker (Meryl Streep) returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: The Last Temptation of Christ
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's controversial adaptation of the Nikos Kazantzakis novel portrays a sometimes reluctant, self-doubting Jesus who gradually comes to accept his divinity(n)

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: A has-been screenwriter reluctantly takes a teaching job at a university in New York. He soon becomes emotionally invested in the lives of his students, particularly a single mother who recently caught the writing bug(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: In this unconventional yet heartwarming family drama, an aging rocker (Meryl Streep) returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: Small Town Saturday Night
programme.desc: A singer-songwriter (Chris Pine) with big dreams must choose between pursuing a musical career and staying in his hometown to be with the woman of his dreams in this heartfelt drama directed by Ryan Craig(n)

programme.desc: A has-been screenwriter reluctantly takes a teaching job at a university in New York. He soon becomes emotionally invested in the lives of his students, particularly a single mother who recently caught the writing bug(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller a successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realizes that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: In this unconventional yet heartwarming family drama, an aging rocker (Meryl Streep) returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: White Noise
programme.desc: Michael Keaton stars as an architect who is shattered by the death of his beloved wife, and is then contacted by a man (Ian McNeice) who claims he is receiving messages from his dead wife through Electronic Voice Phenomena, The grieving widower ultimately is convinced of the communication's validity, and soon becomes fixated on trying to contact his wife himself -- but his investigation into EVP inadvertently unlocks a door to another terrifying world(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: The Price of Power. After Elizabeth's coronation, an extravagant display designed to silence critics of their marriage, Edward needs a son to secure his reign. But tensions at court escalate into outright war and Edward must fight those closest to him to retain his crown. Elizabeth faces devastating loss as the full force of Warwick's hatred is revealed(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman reprises his role as forensic psychologist Alex Cross. This time he teams up with Secret Service agent Jezzie Flannigan, who was responsible for the mistake that let a brilliant but deadly psychopath to kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this kidnapping is just the beginning of the terror in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks for some reason decided to wait a decade before spoofing Star Wars and its ilk, and ten years was certainly too long to wait for this relatively weak offering from the comedy director. That said, there are a fair few laughs, mostly from Rick Moranis as Vader clone Dark Helmet and the late John Candy as the reliable space dog, Barf(n)

programme.title: Small Town Saturday Night
programme.desc: A singer-songwriter (Chris Pine) with big dreams must choose between pursuing a musical career and staying in his hometown to be with the woman of his dreams in this heartfelt drama directed by Ryan Craig(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: Thriller set in 2047 about a missing spacecraft that turns up seven years after it disappeared, with the crew dead and a strange entity on board. A reconnaissance ship is despatched carrying a group of scientists, including the inventor of the spaceship's engine, a gravity drive motor named the Event Horizon. They soon discover a presence none of them could have expected(n)

programme.title: Northmen - A Viking Saga
programme.desc: After being banished from their homeland, a group of ruthless vikings are shipwrecked behind enemy lines. As a mercenary army bears down on them, it is a race against time to escape or be hunted down(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Witnesses to an assassination attempt against the president, including Secret Service agents Kent Taylor (Matthew Fox) and Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid), come away with sharply differing impressions of who did what to whom Barnes tries to piece together the shocking truth from the contradictory evidence and accounts. Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town Renegades
programme.desc: The Cheyenne Kid's out to stop a crook from cheating the owners of a gold mine. Lash La Rue, Al St. John, Jack Ingram, Jennifer Holt, William Fawcett(n)

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist; a nasty industrialist; his put-upon wife; hit men; and a philosophical street person(n)

programme.title: Gunmen
programme.desc: 400 million dollars are hidden in a boat in some harbor in South America. When Dani Sevigo's brother gets killed, Dani is a wanted man - by undercover DEA agent Cole Parker and Armor O'Malley, who is working for drug boss Loomis. Who finds the boat first?(n)

programme.title: Dead Heist
programme.desc: Filmmaker Bo Webb makes his feature directorial debut with this hybrid horror film that combines elements of a heist thriller and a zombie flick. When a group of crooks hatch a plot to rob a bank, they encounter something none of them had planned for. The crew suddenly finds themselves trapped inside the bank while a throng of blood-lusting zombies surrounds the building in search of mortal flesh. Released straight to DVD, Dead Heist stars old-school rapper Big Daddy Kane(n)

programme.title: The Grudge 2
programme.desc: Japanese horror specialist Takashi Shimizu returns to the mythology that terrified audiences the world over with this terror-inducing sequel to the hit 2004 frightener. When a cursed Tokyo home is burned to the ground, the baneful spirit once confined within its walls is suddenly unleased to terrorize anyone and everyone who crosses its dark path. Original producers Sam Raimi, Rob Tapert, and Taka Ichise return to help Shimizu realize his hair-raising vision with this tale that finds Karen's (Sarah Michelle Gellar) sister, Aubrey (Amber Tamblyn), teaming with spellbound journalist Eason (Edison Chen) to investigate the spectral mystery. Meanwhile, the ghostly grip of Toshio (Oga Tanaka) and Kayako (Takako Fuji) tightens on a Chicago housewife (Jennifer Beals) halfway across the globe(n)

programme.title: Hostage Hotel
programme.desc: In this tense police thriller, a Vietnam veteran and his henchman take three hostages and barricade themselves inside a refurbished hotel. programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: Fantasy thriller in which Liam Neeson is Peyton Westlake, a brilliant scientist on the verge of a breakthrough in his research on synthetic skin. An experimental medical procedure saves his life, but Westlake is both physically and psychologically scarred by the event, unable to continue a normal life with his girlfriend. However, when an encounter with a gang of brutal thugs leaves him close to death and scarred beyond recognition, Westlake retreats into the shadows, away from his girlfriend Julie and the rest of the outside world, setting up a new laboratory in an abandoned building. There, with the aid of his still-intact brilliant mind, Westlake refashions himself as the shadowy superhero Darkman(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Following Fiona's imprisonment, Michael is reeling from her loss, and Anson is on the run. If he doesn't want her sacrifice to have been in vain, he will have to stop the fugitive from disappearing for ever. Desperate to escape, Anson sends an assassin to Madeline's house and leaves a trail of bodies in his wake. Despite all the obstacles thrown in his way, Michael manages to corner him at a coastal industrial plant.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A complaint is filed against Brenda, which threatens her career in the squad, but when Captain Pope offers to help, she is dubious about his intentions. Meanwhile, the detectives are kept busy trying to trace the killer of a Hollywood producer. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The pressure is on for Brenda and her team to solve the murder of a police detective, but as evidence points to one of their own, the Deputy Police Chief struggles to match DNA samples that could prove their case. However, it becomes clear Gabriel and Daniels' relationship to the victim is key to understanding the crime. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A woman's murder bears the hallmarks of one committed by jailed serial killer Kevin Reddick, raising fears that he has found an accomplice to carry on his work while he is in prison. The investigation leads back to a series of experiments performed on Reddick to discover the cause of his madness.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the discovery of a woman's body in the Bronx and learn she was reported missing 20 years previously. Suspicion falls on a businessman and his friend, but inquiries hit a dead end - until the team finds a link to two earlier rape cases with similarities to the murder.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A doctor dies on board the USS Borealis during a heavy storm and when the ship is brought into Norfolk Naval Yard, Ducky's investigation reveals a telltale mark on the victim's carotid artery, suggesting he was injected with poison. Initial inquiries focus on a petty officer with a history of drug use who may have wanted the doctor to remain silent about his problems. American drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team are called in when a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, and make a grim discovery when they find a finger in the bin. Meanwhile, Ziva ruffles a few feathers by insisting on continuing her investigation into the murder of her father, asking for permission to go to Rome on the trail of the chief suspect. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: When a juror dies during the trial of a Mob boss, Brenda has her work cut out questioning the remainder of the jury, while an unannounced visit puts her plans with Fritz on hold. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda investigates the murders of three college students, apparently caught in the middle of a gang shootout. It transpires that one of the youngsters was the son of people known to Taylor. The detective also tries to keep her relationship with Fritz under wraps while her mother remains in town. Detective drama, with Kyra Sedgwick, Robert Gossett and Jon Tenney.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A Russian Mob leader's daughter is killed in what initially appears to be an act of gangland revenge against her father - until the focus of the investigation shifts to one of her classmates, who has an altogether more personal reason for wanting her dead. Drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A successful auditor appears to have killed his family and then himself, but an analysis of the crime scene suggests a different scenario. When Goren and Eames learn the dead man uncovered a pensions scandal involving retired cops, the trail leads to corruption within the force.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: New Mossad director Orli Elbaz asks for the team's help in finding Ilan Bodnar when one of her agents is shot dead in Virginia, telling Gibbs he was investigating several operatives who had gone rogue after Eli David's death. Ziva travels with Tony to Berlin in her pursuit of Bodnar, the man she believes was responsible for the death of her father. Guest starring Marina Sirtis (Star Trek: The Next Generation).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tracks Bodnar's SUV to a remote house in the countryside, but inside find only his dead accomplice - identified as a South African mercenary who helped Bodnar procure diamonds. Ziva and Tony, meanwhile, discharge themselves from hospital and wheedle information out of Abby to continue investigating on the quiet, having been warned by Homeland Security to stay off the case.(n)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life.
programme.desc: The stakes mount ever higher as Rick and his fellow Alexandrians continue to enact their intricate plan to overthrow their oppressors.(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: New series. The supernatural thriller returns, as reluctant spirit medium Kyle Barnes struggles to protect those he holds most dear as his possessions increase in scope and number.(n)

programme.desc: American comedian Chris Hardwick presents discussion of the latest episode of the Walking Dead with fans, actors, producers and TV enthusiasts.(n)

programme.desc: Lois goes to see the family doctor, who looks into her history and discovers she is Jewish, a revelation that pleases Peter - until a visit from the spirit of his dead father changes his mind.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan begins playing golf with Senator Buckingham in a bid to advance in the CIA, but Roger accidentally sells the politician's daughter to a drug lord, which leaves Stan having to choose between his family and his career.(n)

programme.desc: Roger bets Klaus that he can make Steve popular at school, but none of his plans seem to work - until the high school's in-crowd realise Steve can be their designated driver. Meanwhile, Stan and Francine play pranks on each other.(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: The CIA denies Michael's request to see Fiona behind bars, so he calls upon his old mentor Tom Card - the man who abandoned him in the wake of his burn notice. In exchange for his assistance, Westen agrees to help stop a Mexican cartel from gaining a foothold in Miami. In prison, his ally is targeted by a ruthless gang leader, and must turn to a new friend to help fend them off.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: As Brenda's 40th birthday approaches, she investigates the high-profile case of a woman who was murdered at one of Los Angeles' trendiest restaurants. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in Provenza's garage, forcing Brenda to become involved in a cover-up of her own. The detective struggles to protect members of her team, who find themselves racing against the clock before the LAPD finds out what they are up to. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A magazine publisher is killed by a car bomb after he demands to meet a disabled girl he has been supporting. Goren and Eames begin to suspect the girl in question does not even exist and that her foster parents are running an elaborate fraud. Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A stockbroker discovers unsettling information about a company trading in land and water rights, and later becomes the prime suspect in the murder of her lover. However, evidence emerges that the crime is part of a scheme to manipulate share prices.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A cook from a US Navy destroyer tells McGee and Gibbs he believes someone is stalking him with the intention of trying to make him poison the crew, and a picture on a stolen phone leads the team to a group testing the psychological effects of surveillance. Meanwhile, Richard Parsons from the Inspector General's office closes in on Ziva as he investigates the death of Ilan Bodnar, the man who killed her father. Guest starring Colin Hanks (Gus Grimly in the Fargo TV series).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates when Navy Seal Chad McBride's wife receives a package from Riyadh in Saudi Arabia containing her husband's severed head, which Palmer discovers contains very high levels of radiation. McBride's commanding officer reveals the soldier was on a top-secret reconnaissance mission and asks Vance not to disclose the details to anyone. Meanwhile, Richard Parsons tries to get Gibbs to take responsibility for the many unnecessary deaths for which he holds the NCIS team accountable.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Palmer faces a dilemma during a hit-and-run investigation when he spots a stranger standing on a ledge, and places his own life in peril in an attempt to get the man down to safety.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The wife of a man who Danny helped to convict for manslaughter arrives at the TAC offices with a bomb, and takes the team hostage to force Bull to prove her husband's innocence.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The residents of Quahog are invited to spend an evening at James Woods' mansion, but guests start turning up dead, transforming the event into a murder mystery, with everyone struggling to identify the killer among them.(n)
